page.title: 04MY SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: Each morning on a school day my clock radio wakes me up at 7 o'clock.Before we had Hayley's kitten I got up at 7.15 a.m. but now I get up at 5 past 7 because I need to have a wash,get dressed and go downstairs to see how Lottie my kitten is.Then I feed her,and have my breakfast of Weetabix.After that I brush my hair,clean my teeth and put my shoes on.I have a little play with Lottie then its about time to go to school,so Iput my coat on and set off to school.First of all I go to pick up Emma then we carry on.When we get to school the bell rings at 9 o'clock then the register is called.Next we line up for assembly
